sentences.en: Genesis recorded a song which took a swipe at greedy property developers who bought up and demolished people's homes.
sentences.cn: 吉妮西丝录制了一首歌来抨击那些买下并毁坏人们家园的贪婪的房地产开发商。

sentences.en: Have you eaten them all, you greedy pig!
sentences.cn: 你把那些全吃了？你这贪吃的猪！

sentences.en: Have you eaten them all, you greedy pig?
sentences.cn: 你把那些全吃了？你这贪吃的猪！

sentences.en: Having finished the handful, the greedy bird pecked directly from the packet.
sentences.cn: 那黑鸟贪得无厌,直冲上前衔他那袋零食.

sentences.en: He is greedy like a hog.
He looked at the gold with greedy eyes.
sentences.cn: 他贪婪地看着这些金子。

sentences.en: He was rich enough but then men are always greedy.
It was greedy of them to eat up all the candy.
sentences.cn: 他们把所有的糖都吃光了,真贪吃.

sentences.en: She was too full of wonder and desire to be greedy.
sentences.cn: 她现在充满了惊奇和渴望,当然不会有贪婪的念头.

sentences.en: That big - bellied fellow was very cruel and greedy.
sentences.cn: 那个大腹便便的家伙既贪婪又残恶.

sentences.en: The boy cannot be hungry; it is sheer greedy.
sentences.cn: 这孩子不是肚子饿, 就是馋嘴.

sentences.en: The greedy boss stopped at nothing to gain profit.
sentences.cn: 贪婪的老板为了攫取利润无所不为.

sentences.en: The greedy child brought up all he had eaten.
sentences.cn: 这个贪吃的孩子把吃下去的东西全部吐了出来.

sentences.en: The greedy madam stopped at nothing to gain profit.
sentences.cn: 贪婪的老鸨为了攫取利润无所不为.

sentences.en: Tom is greedy to do his homework.
sentences.cn: 汤姆急欲做他的家庭作业.

sentences.en: You greedy pig! You've already had two helpings!
sentences.cn: 你这个馋嘴！你已经吃了两份了！

trans.tran_cn: 贪吃的，贪心的，贪婪的，渴望的
trans.tran_en: always wanting more food, money, power, possessions etc than you need
